markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Assured Ritualist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6392) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=612" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 211 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Ritualist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=260)

**Prerequisites**
[Flexible Ritualist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6389)

</column>

---

You can cover for a secondary caster's error. If you are the primary caster, after all the secondary checks are rolled, you can choose one check that was a failure or critical failure, and improve the result to one degree of success better than what the secondary caster rolled.
name: Assured Ritualist

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 10" pfs="Standard" > Assured Ritualist Source Player Core 2 pg. 211 1.1 Archetype Ritualist Prerequisites Flexible Ritualist --- You can cover for a secondary caster's error. If you are the primary caster, after all the secondary checks are rolled, you can choose one check that was a failure or critical failure, and improve the result to one degree of success better than what the secondary caster rolled.
